# Quality Gate 3 — Identity Phase Review
## BLVNK Canvas Launch Kit | Feb 12, 2026

**Reports Reviewed:**
- `outputs/01-market-intelligence-report.md` (Dept 1)
- `outputs/02-competitive-dynamics-report.md` (Dept 2)
- `outputs/03-strategy-psychology-report.md` (Dept 3)
- `outputs/04-narrative-verbal-identity.md` (Dept 4)
- `outputs/05-creative-visual-direction.md` (Dept 5)

---

## Applicable Checks (Gate 3)

### 1. Strategic Consistency ✅ PASS

| Check | Status | Notes |
|-------|--------|-------|
| "Different vs. Better" Test | ✅ | Verbal identity (Dept 4) names a NEW problem ("dead deliverables"), not a better solution to an old problem. Visual identity (Dept 5) differentiates through dark mode default — competitors all use white/light |
| Magic Triangle Alignment | ✅ | Product (interactive BIS) visually expressed as intelligence platform. Company (solo + AI) reflected in precise, systematic design language. Category ("Brand Intelligence Systems") reinforced through every naming choice |
| Category/Positioning consistent | ✅ | All 5 departments reference "Brand Intelligence Systems" as the category. No slippage |
| No zero-sum thinking | ✅ | Manifesto creates a new category villain ("dead deliverables"), not competitors |

### 2. Brand Identity Alignment ✅ PASS

| Check | Status | Notes |
|-------|--------|-------|
| Single dominant archetype | ✅ | Magician throughout — verbal (revelatory, insight language) and visual (dark palette, illuminated accents, light-in-darkness imagery) |
| Visual matches archetype | ✅ | Charcoal + illuminated blue = revelation in darkness. Architectural imagery = systematic precision. Exact Magician visual codes confirmed |
| Voice dimensions align | ✅ | Dept 4 voice (revelatory, precise, controlled confidence) matched by Dept 5 visual (restrained, premium, intelligence-coded). Visual-verbal alignment verified |
| Anti-patterns documented | ✅ | Both departments explicitly list anti-patterns: no Jester energy (playful), no Hero energy (conquering), no stock photography, no AI imagery, forbidden words list |
| Photography direction | ✅ | Data visualization, architectural, abstract light — matches intelligence positioning. Explicitly rejects stock photos |

### 3. Visual-Verbal Coherence ✅ PASS (New Check for Gate 3)

| Check | Status | Notes |
|-------|--------|-------|
| Tagline works visually | ✅ | "Your brand, decoded." — 3 words, declarative period. Works typographically (Instrument Serif accent or Inter Semibold). Short enough for mobile hero |
| Color palette matches tone | ✅ | Dark charcoal = controlled confidence (Dept 4 voice). Signal Blue = precision (Creator secondary). Warm White = approachable authority |
| Typography matches voice | ✅ | Inter (geometric, systematic) = Creator precision. Instrument Serif (editorial, authoritative) = Magician gravitas. Match confirmed |
| Word bank → Visual vocabulary | ✅ | "Decode, reveal, intelligence" (Dept 4) → Dark + illuminated accents (Dept 5). "Engineered, architected, systematic" (Dept 4) → Grid system, monospace data font (Dept 5). Word choices map to visual choices |

### 4. Quality Dimensions

| Check | Status | Notes |
|-------|--------|-------|
| Copy: Me/You ratio | ✅ | 20-25% brand / 75-80% customer across all templates |
| Copy: Reading level | ✅ | All content 3rd-5th grade Flesch-Kincaid |
| Visual: Squint Test | ✅ | Looks like intelligence platform, not creative agency |
| Visual: Grid integrity | ✅ | 8pt grid. All spacing tokens documented |
| Visual: Semiotic consistency | ✅ | All 8 visual signs point to "intelligence + systematic precision" |
| Visual: Accessibility | ✅ | Primary text contrast ~14:1 (exceeds WCAG AAA) |

---

## Cross-Department Consistency Audit (All 5 Reports)

| Check | Dept 1 | Dept 2 | Dept 3 | Dept 4 | Dept 5 | Consistent? |
|-------|--------|--------|--------|--------|--------|-------------|
| Core differentiator | Interactive deliverables | Costly signal | Category Design element | "Strategy that talks back" | Intelligence platform visual | ✅ |
| Category name | — (pre-name) | — (pre-name) | "Brand Intelligence Systems" | "Brand Intelligence Systems" | Visual codes match BIS positioning | ✅ |
| Archetype | Hypothesized Magician | Leaned Magician | Formalized Magician + Creator | Verbal expression defined | Visual expression defined | ✅ |
| Competitive approach | Blue Ocean | Not Prisoner's Dilemma | Category Design | Manifesto attacks "dead deliverables" | Dark mode differentiates from all-white competitors | ✅ |
| AI positioning | Don't lead with AI | Never lead with AI | AI enables, not defines | "AI-powered" is forbidden word | No tool screenshots, no AI imagery | ✅ |
| Premium signal | Quiet Luxury | Costly signaling | Loss aversion pricing | Controlled confidence voice | 60%+ whitespace, restrained palette | ✅ |

---

## Gate 3 Verdict: ✅ PASS — Proceed to Phase 4

**Score: All applicable sections pass.** Visual-verbal alignment is strong. All 5 departments maintain strategic consistency. The brand system is now complete enough (strategy + narrative + visual) to build the digital experience.

**Key finding:** The "never lead with AI" directive has been maintained across ALL 5 departments — this is the strongest thread of consistency. It started as a competitive dynamics observation (Dept 2) and has cascaded perfectly into forbidden words (Dept 4) and forbidden imagery (Dept 5).

---

*Quality Gate 3 reviewed by Antigravity (Gemini) | Feb 12, 2026*
